r.d: Package contains locale validation for Brazilian Portuguese such as: * Postal Code * CNPJ * CPF * Region (brazilian states) * Phone Number * Vehicle's plate * PIS
r.n: - Fixed Bug #12783 (thanks to jhenrique) - Fixed Bug #11823 phpcs/Coding Standards issues highlighted. - Avoid two strlen calls on pis() - cosmetic changes - PHP test updated - add new method pis()
